full_summary:
### ITT: Floating Plant Dredging 2024 Gulf Region NB
#### Reference Number: WS4445321833-Doc4450323203

This solicitation is issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) through the Atlantic Region Acquisitions office, which provides services in English. The estimated budget for this project is between $500,001 and $1,000,000.

### Tender Overview

The PSPC requires a contractor to provide floating plant dredging services for Class "B" underwater materials at three locations: Pointe-Sapin Channel, Cap-Lumiere Channel, Barre de Cocagne Channel, and Blacklands Channel. The dredged material will be disposed of at each of the wharf locations in Westmorland and Kent Counties, Gulf Region New Brunswick.

### Tender Requirements

* Estimated duration: 16 weeks from award
* Site visit: Not scheduled; recommended for bidders to visit the site before submitting a bid
* Language: Proposals may be submitted in either official language of Canada
* Electronic submission: Proposals must be submitted via SAP Ariba by the closing date and time indicated

### Contact and Enquiries

* Contracting Authority: Nicole Fesseha, nicole.fesseha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Messages function in SAP Ariba for enquiries: to be submitted no less than 5 days prior to the closing date
* Office hours: Atlantic Region Acquisitions

### Tender Status

This tender is scheduled to close on **2024-03-05T14:00:00**, with an expected contract start date of **2024-03-13**.

### Unspsc Code

The UNSPSC code for this tender is *72141206*, corresponding to **Dredging services**.

### Trade Agreements

This solicitation is covered under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Closing Date and Time

The tender closing date and time is **2024-03-05T14:00:00**.

### Notice URL

The notice URL for this tender is <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18836686?extsite=MTg4MzY2ODZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
